name: Reginald BLASSINGALE, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Blassingale v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Reginald BLASSINGALE, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of October, 2011, the Application for Appointment of Counsel and the Petition for Allowance of Appeal are hereby DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
30 A.3d 1100
Reginald BLASSINGALE, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 13, 2011.
